msg-1.subject: Computer
msg-1.body: Hi Dean, I'm interested in getting a computer built for my son. Could you give me some information on how to proceed? Thanks, Harley

msg-2.subject: Re: Computer
msg-2.body: Hi Harley, Thanks for getting in touch. I can certainly help with that. Are you looking for a custom build, or would you like to choose one of the standard systems from my website? Best, Dean

msg-3.subject: Re: Computer
msg-3.body: Hi Dean, Gaming Build B looks perfect. Thanks, Harley

msg-4.subject: Re: Computer
msg-4.body: Great choice, Harley. Please find the order form and specification details. Here is the payment link for the 25% deposit, with the balance due on completion. Let me know if you have any questions. Best, Dean

msg-5.subject: Homework PC
msg-5.body: Hi Dean, I'd like to order the Homework Build D PC for my daughter. Can you let me know the next steps? Thanks, Skyler

msg-6.subject: Re: Homework PC
msg-6.body: Hi Skyler, Absolutely. Please find the order form and specification details for the Homework Build D. Here is the payment link for the 25% deposit, with the balance due on completion. Best, Dean
